name: Silver Gardens Senior Apartments Birthday Celebration
description: Students get the opportunity to volunteer at the Silver Gardens Senior Apartments by celebrating birthdays with the seniors! Students will bake cakes in advance and bring to the senior center, which they will serve to the seniors.

name: Little Shepherd Autistic Center Volunteering
description: Students will bake deserts prior to the volunteering and bring the deserts to Little Shepherd, an organization that helps take care of autistic individuals. Students will then spend time helping the other volunteers take care of and play with the autistic kids.
